Reviews.Title: Criacket  SCH-R710
Reviews.Author: Sammy  Manuel
Reviews.Content: Cricket  did  not  have  it.  Samsung  INC  in  TEXAS  said  it's  been  discontinued.  A  cricket  sales  lady  said  go  to  Amazon  thay  may  have  it.  YOU  DID !!!  Thank  you  !!!

Reviews.Title: Brand new
Reviews.Author: Lisa Garber
Reviews.Content: Item came quickly. Brand new in original box and came with all accessories. Phone Works perfectly and it was very reasonably priced.

Reviews.Title: Nice even if its not a smartphone!
Reviews.Author: Lytisha Campbell
Reviews.Content: good starter hone and it works and has a loud speaker for music and ringtones. my daughter likes it even if its not a smartphone.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Alicia Johnson
Reviews.Content: I received my phone when I was suppose to and it was new , just as I ordered it.Also I got it for a great price!!

Reviews.Title: Replacement Phone
Reviews.Author: Saint Tatters
Reviews.Content: Not sure what is going on as the old phone of this same type was able to download and keep in phone storage an incredible number of songs, yet this one acts as though memory is Much smaller.I had understood they were identical. what's up with this??Other than that, it works fine.

Reviews.Title: it doesnt work
Reviews.Author: Melissa Bikowicz
Reviews.Content: dont buy this phone if you  want muve music it doesnt work cricket doesnt allow this phone to do it anymore, i suggest you call cricket to make sure which phone will work

Reviews.Title: PHONE
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: I like the phone I never used a touch screen so I guess I have to get use to it If you can send me a book on how to use it that will be nice

Reviews.Title: Samsung makes good products
Reviews.Author: Marlene Maloni
Reviews.Content: I knew when I ordered it that it was an exceptional phone.  It is.  Love the touch screen and the dialing keyboard.Get this phone even if you aren't a music fan.  It's a great phone for the price.

Reviews.Title: phone did'nt work right!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: courtney clayton
Reviews.Content: No music chip, can't connect to internet & the headphone portal dont work!!!!! It was suppose to be brand new but i think it was refurbished!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: camra dont work on neither phones
Reviews.Author: chrisina west
Reviews.Content: No instruction manual but a new phone,please send manual,and the pink rubber case is way to big.Thank you for your time

Reviews.Title: Out dated?
Reviews.Author: Patrick
Reviews.Content: I didnt realize this phone was outdated but my dad didnt mind it since he had an old flip phone that fell apart one day before i recieved it in the mail. I could've got a better phone for cheaper.

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: latricia Johnson
Reviews.Content: purchased phone for love one...only down it's a bit small other than that the phone is easy for him to use.

Reviews.Title: Not real happy
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: This phone always cuts off my calls when I'm dialing and a lot of times while I'm talking. Very disappointed with it.
